snippet.title: Marble World - Early Access on Steam 7th of May!
snippet.description:
Marble World got a release date!

Create your own marble races, runs & machines! Decorate tracks & environments to your likings and fabricate unique experiences and share them with the world! Marble World is a 3D physics simulator sandbox with marbles!

Marble World will go into Early Access on May 7th!

Wishlist Marble World here:
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491340/Marble_World/

👉 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491340/Marble_World/
👉 Discord: https://discord.gg/jbx92tbMSG​
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarbleWorldGame​
👉 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/marbleworld​
👉 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/marbleworldgame

"Brightly Fancy" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
